amendment.description: To substitute a requirement for an annual report on competitive sourcing activities on lists required under the Federal Activities Inventory Reform Act of 1998 that are performed for the Department of the Interior by Federal Government sources.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1754 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 53 - 43. Record Vote Number: 360.

action.text: Amendment SA 1754 proposed by Senator Voinovich.
Amendment SA 1754 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1754 proposed by Senator Voinovich to Amendment SA 1731. (consideration: CR S11791-11795, S11807; text: S11791-11792) To substitute a requirement for an annual report on competitive sourcing activities on lists required under the Federal Activities Inventory Reform Act of 1998 that are performed for the Department of the Interior by Federal Government sources.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1754 proposed by Senator Voinovich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1754 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 53 - 43. Record Vote Number: 360.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1754 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 53 - 43. Record Vote Number: 360.
